translations: 有头脑的，聪明的，多智的（brainy 的比较级）

phrs.translation: 聪明的, 精明的比较级

sentences.sentence: Their best firms are also getting brainier.
sentences.translation: 他们中最好的公司也正变成“大脑”。

sentences.sentence: Asian firms are having to become brainier, more nimble and more global.
sentences.translation: 亚洲企业正在变成更为灵活和全球化的“大脑”。

sentences.sentence: Goldmans thought is we are richer than you and McKinseys is we are brainier than you.
sentences.translation: 高盛的思想是“我们比你富有”，而麦肯锡的是“我们比你有头脑”。
